Text: Love this old nostalgia stuff - and if it has planes - then even better.  Anyone have any other episodes?  Might make a nice collection to add to my aviation series of meda.  Thnx Flixer for the upload!

meda?  Duh - medIa!

Also, ton of us stuck at 38.8% on Just Planes - Air Greenland.  Shows lots of excellent views of that far off land - anyone know where to get the rest of the file?  I have been asking around, in the hopes that someone might be able to find it.  Thanks again.

Excellant quality. It brings back memories of when I was a kid. I'd love to see more. You should leave the commercials in though. It would let people see what the times were like back then. thnx again

It didn't get any better than Miss Penny for pubescent boys "in the day". The airplane is what Ma thought we liked best about the show. 
Little did she know that it was just Penny that kept our interest - it was a good tv show and better than Lash LaRue. 
Thank you and of course I'll seed.
